subject: fix(build): resolve all TypeScript build errors
body:
- ExpenseForm.vue: Extract handleCategoryBlur method to avoid template
  setTimeout resolving against component instance instead of window
- DebugPill.vue: Remove unused entry parameter in subscribe callback
- CompareTab.vue: Use v-else-if="comparison" for vue-tsc null narrowing
- vite.config.ts: Add @types/node for path, process, and __dirname
